sentences.sContent: The country was plunged into economic chaos.
sentences.sCn: 这个国家陷入了经济大混乱。

phrases.pCn: [数]决定性混沌；命定混沌（等于chaos）

remMethod.val: chao(拼音“吵”) + s(音似： 死) → 吵死啦！ → 混乱

trans.tranOther: a situation in which everything is happening in a confused way and nothing is organized or arranged in order
